content: With our strong operating and financial momentum, supportive macroeconomic outlook for 2023 and beyond and net debt to Q3 2022 adjusted EBITDA of approximately 2.4 times, we are actively considering our options for refinancing our capital structure in a constructive way. With our strong operating and financial momentum, supportive macroeconomic outlook for 2023 and beyond and net debt to Q3 2022 adjusted EBITDA of approximately 2.4 times, we are actively considering our options for refinancing our capital structure in a constructive way.
